title: Pool Party Rek Sai backport animation
body:
The backport animation is sometimes bugged, I think it is when she has blue or redbuff. When the animation is bugged the part where she jumps in the air is missing, so she only goes down and then appears at ground level without attacking the frog, who disappears. 
I hope you will fix it soon as I am RekSai main and love the poolparty backport animation :D

replies.body:
Hey Pommes I,

This was a bug in Patch 5.12 that we've since resolved. This issue is fixed in Patch 5.13. :]
